channel.title: How do you add D-claws to a 508 server?help please?
channel.description:
hi, i want to add some D-claws to my 508 server but i don't have the codes and i also want a fully working spec that hit's on npc's as well as other player's
thanks purepkworld

item.title: How do you add D-claws to a 508 server?help please?
item.dc:creator: @rain1994 rain1994
item.description:
@rain1994 wrote:

usernam62618:

What -A- Noob.

What an ass…
First I recemend just getting a client that has the dclaws in it. The code will probably be ::item 3101 for the d claws. For the spec I am currently tring to figure out myself.

If you spawn the item and connot weild it go into your source files look for Equipment.java and find the array that contains the type of item you are adding. D claws would be in Weapons[] for example. Just add each item name into the correct array =]

Read full topic
item.source: How do you add D-claws to a 508 server?help please?
